title: White chocolate cheesecake with blueberry sauce
ingredients: ['Base', '175g crushed digestive biscuits', '140g flaked almonds', '100g caster sugar', '4 tablespoons clarified butter, melted', '2 tablespoons caramel sauce or topping', 'Filling', '500g white chocolate, chopped', '4 (200g) tubs cream cheese, softened', '150g caster sugar', '4 eggs, beaten', '2 egg yolks', '1 tablespoon plain flour', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', 'Topping', '100g caster sugar', '1 teaspoon cornflour', '60ml water', '1 punnet fresh blueberries', '2 teaspoons lemon juice']
